Metadata: Time for a change: alternatives to copper-based boat bottom paint (English & Spanish versions DVD)

This DVD is based on a series of research and education projects by authors from the University of California Cooperative Extension-Sea Grant Extension Program in San Diego County. This information will help boat owners, boating and coating businesses, and government and environmental organizations make decisions about cost- effective and environmentally friendly antifouling strategies. Separate programs in English and Spanish are included on this DVD. Additional information may be obtained from: http://seagrant​.ucdavis.edu/ and http://www.csgc​.ucsd.edu.
